column1:
When I level up, create 3 random Lurkers in hand.
When I Lurk or Attack: Grant Lurker allies everywhere +1|+0.

"We have known of her terror for generations, but for our ancestors to know her, too? How old must she be? How many of our people has she butchered? The thought unsettles me greatly." - Fezhaur, Vekauran elder
